creator: De Vries, David
title: Foundation plan.  San Bernardino Valley Union Junior College, Library Building.  Also includes sections A through MM.  Howard E. Jones, Architect, San Bernardino, California.  Sheet 1, job no. 315.  Scales 1/8 inch to the foot (plan) and 1/2 inch to the foot (sections).  No date given on sheet (probably March or April, 1927). - San Bernardino Valley College, Library, 701 South Mount Vernon Avenue, San Bernardino, San Bernardino County, CA
